properties.areaDesc: Lake Superior from Saxon Harbor WI to Upper Entrance to Portage Canal MI 5NM off shore to the US/Canadian border including Isle Royal National Park; Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Lake Superior west of a line from Saxon Harbor WI to Grand Portage MN beyond 5NM; Black River To Ontonagon MI; Lake Superior from Upper Entrance to Portage Canal to Manitou Island MI 5NM off shore to the US/Canadian Border; Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI; Upper Entrance of Portage Canal to Eagle River MI; Eagle River to Manitou Island MI
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Warning issued February 11 at 4:16AM EST until February 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy freezing spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or
greater expected, and may rapidly accumulate on vessels.
Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and waves 7
to 12 feet expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Western Lake Superior.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, from 1 PM EST
/noon CST/ Wednesday to 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Thursday. For the
Gale Warning, from 3 PM EST /2 PM CST/ this afternoon to 1 AM
EST /midnight CST/ Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of stability.
Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could capsize or
damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM EST /2 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THURSDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ WEDNESDAY TO 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY
